trans-unit.source: As an example, let's assume a routine, created by a superuser who's specified as the DEFINER, deletes all records from a table. If SQL SECURITY=DEFINER, anyone running the routine, regardless of whether they have delete privileges, will be able to delete the records. If SQL SECURITY = INVOKER, the routine will only delete the records if the account invoking the routine has permission to do so.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个例程由指定为 DEFINER 的超级用户创建，该例程将从表中删除所有记录。如果 SQL SECURITY=DEFINER ，则运行该例程的任何人，无论他们是否具有删除特权，都将能够删除记录。如果 SQL SECURITY = INVOKER ，则只有在调用例程的帐户有权这样做的情况下，例程才会删除记录。

trans-unit.source: As currently implemented by MariaDB and by the SQL Standard, data may be truncated if not correctly cast. It is necessary to CAST the column to the correct width if the CTE's recursive part produces wider values for a column than the CTE's nonrecursive part. Some other DBMS give an error in this situation, and MariaDB's behavior may change in future - see MDEV-12325. See the examples below.
trans-unit.target: 正如MariaDB和SQL标准当前实现的那样，如果数据转换不正确，数据可能会被截断。如果CTE的递归部分为列生成的值比CTE的非递归部分宽，则必须将列CAST到正确的宽度。其他一些DBMS在这种情况下也会出错，MariaDB的行为将来可能会更改-请参阅MDEV-12325。请参阅下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: As far as automatic table discovery is concerned, the tables, from the server point of view, may appear, disappear, or change structure anytime. Thus the server needs to be able to ask whether a given table exists and what its structure is. It needs to be notified when a table structure changes outside of the server. And it needs to be able to get a list of all (unknown to the server) tables, for statements like SHOW TABLES. The server does all that by invoking specific methods of the handlerton:
trans-unit.target: 就自动表发现而言，从服务器的角度看，表随时可能出现，消失或更改结构。因此，服务器需要能够询问给定的表是否存在及其结构。当表结构在服务器外部更改时，需要通知它。并且它需要能够获得所有（服务器未知的）表的列表，以用于类似 SHOW TABLES 的语句。服务器通过调用 handlerton 的特定方法来完成所有这些工作：

trans-unit.source: As for EXPLAIN, it will give no indication whether filesort uses priority queue or the generic quicksort and merge algorithm. Using filesort will be shown in both cases, by both MariaDB and MySQL.
trans-unit.target: 至于 EXPLAIN ，它不会给出文件排序是使用优先级队列还是通用的快速排序和合并算法的指示。在这两种情况下，MariaDB和MySQL都将显示 Using filesort 。

trans-unit.source: As for ODBC, the columns definition can be omitted and will be retrieved by the discovery process. The restrictions concerning column definitions are the same as for ODBC.
trans-unit.target: 和ODBC一样,列的定义可以省略,并由发现过程来检索。关于列定义的限制与ODBC相同。

trans-unit.source: As for execution costs, we're going to read 15 rows from table City, write 15 rows to materialized table, read them back (the optimizer assumes there won't be any duplicates), and then do 15 eq_ref accesses to table Country. In total, we'll do 45 reads and 15 writes.
trans-unit.target: 至于执行成本,我们要从表City中读取15行,向物化表写入15行,再读回来(优化器假设不会有任何重复),然后对表Country进行15次eq_ref访问。我们总共要做45次读取和15次写入。

trans-unit.source: As in the example above, the partition ranged from 1992-01-01 to 1998-08-02. Potentially it may be desirable to drop the remaining 1998 rows.
trans-unit.target: 如上例中,分区范围为1992-01-01至1998-08-02。可能最好是删除剩余的1998行。

trans-unit.source: As little copying as possible under higher level stages/locks. For example, .frm (dictionary) and .trn (trigger) files should be copying while copying the table data.
trans-unit.target: 在更高层次的阶段/锁下,尽量少复制。例如,.frm(字典)和.trn(触发器)文件应在复制表数据的同时进行复制。

trans-unit.source: As long as the table format file tbl_name.frm is valid, the table can be re-created as an empty table with TRUNCATE TABLE, even if the data or index files have become corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 只要表格式文件 tbl_name.frm 有效，就可以使用 TRUNCATE TABLE 将表重新创建为空表，即使数据或索引文件已损坏。

trans-unit.source: As mcsimport is built upon ColumnStore's Bulk Write SDK it inherits its methods to connect to ColumnStore instances to ingest data. By default mcsimport uses the standard configuration file /usr/local/mariadb/ColumnStore/etc/Columnstore.xml or if set the one defined through the environment variable COLUMNSTORE_INSTALL_DIR to connect to the remote Columnstore instance. Individual configurations can be defined through the command line parameter -c. Instructions on how to prepare Columnstore.xml for remote ingestion can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 由于mcsimport基于ColumnStore的Bulk Write SDK构建，因此它继承了其方法以连接到ColumnStore实例以提取数据。默认情况下，mcsimport使用标准配置文件/usr/local/mariadb/ColumnStore/etc/Columnstore.xml，或者设置为通过环境变量COLUMNSTORE_INSTALL_DIR定义的文件，以连接到远程Columnstore实例。可以通过命令行参数-c定义各个配置。在此处可以找到有关如何准备Columnstore.xml以进行远程提取的说明。

trans-unit.source: As mcsimport is using the Bulk Write SDK for the injection, all ports required by the ColumnStore Bulk write SDK need to be accessible from the client executing mcsimport at the target ColumnStore server. These are in particular the TCP ports 8616, 8630, and 8800.
trans-unit.target: 由于mcsimport使用批量写入SDK进行注入，因此需要从目标ColumnStore服务器上执行mcsimport的客户端可以访问ColumnStore批量写入SDK所需的所有端口。这些尤其是TCP端口8616、8630和8800。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned here (and in MDEV-4080 and MDEV-3882) sometimes APT will refuse to install MariaDB. Or, if MariaDB is already installed, suggest the removal of MariaDB to apply an upgrade to the mysql-common or libmysqlclient packages. This happens whenever the version number of those two packages is higher in the distribution repositories than the versions in the MariaDB repositories. Most MariaDB packages have different names than their MySQL counterparts, but in order for upgrades from MySQL to MariaDB to be successful in APT, those two packages must be named the same. Because they have the same names, APT just checks the version numbers and tries to install what it considers to be the most recent.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述这里（和MDEV-4080和MDEV-3882）有时APT会拒绝安装MariaDB的。或者，如果已经安装了MariaDB，建议删除MariaDB，以对 mysql-common 或 libmysqlclient 软件包进行升级。每当这两个软件包的版本号在发行版本存储库中高于MariaDB存储库中的版本时，就会发生这种情况。大多数MariaDB软件包的名称与MySQL软件包的名称不同，但是，为了在APT中成功从MySQL升级到MariaDB，这两个软件包必须命名相同。因为它们具有相同的名称，所以APT只会检查版本号并尝试安装它认为最新的版本。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned above, even though InnoDB is allowing the table to be created, there is still an opportunity for errors. Regardless of whether InnoDB strict mode is enabled, if a DML statement is executed that attempts to write a row that the table's InnoDB row format can't store, then InnoDB will raise an error with this message. This creates a somewhat unsafe situation, because it means that the application has the chance to encounter an additional error while executing DML.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，即使InnoDB允许创建表，仍然存在出错的机会。不管是否启用InnoDB严格模式，如果执行了DML语句尝试写入表的InnoDB行格式无法存储的行，那么InnoDB都会在此消息中引发错误。这会造成某种不安全的情况，因为这意味着应用程序在执行DML时有机会遇到其他错误。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned above, the operation works at partition granularity, which means that a minimal move is 64 million rows. Any table smaller than that will not be redistributed and there may be as much as one full Partition difference in the resulting balance. The redistribute logic does not currently consolidate individually deleted records.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述,该操作在分区粒度上工作,这意味着最小的移动是6400万行。任何小于这个数字的表都不会被重新分布,而且在结果的平衡中可能会有多达一个完整的Partition差异。重分布逻辑目前不合并个别删除的记录。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned in the previous section, in MariaDB 10.1 and above, Galera Cluster support is actually included in the standard MariaDB Server packages. That means that installing MariaDB Galera Cluster package is the same as installing standard MariaDB Server package in those versions. However, you will also have to install an additional package to obtain the Galera wsrep provider library.
trans-unit.target: 如上一节所述，在MariaDB 10.1及更高版本中，标准MariaDB Server软件包中实际上包括Galera Cluster支持。这意味着安装MariaDB Galera Cluster软件包与在那些版本中安装标准MariaDB Server软件包相同。但是，您还必须安装其他软件包才能获取Galera wsrep提供程序库。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned previously, on most servers upgrading from 10.0 should be painless. However, there are some things that have changed which could affect an upgrade:
trans-unit.target: 如前所述,在大多数服务器上,从10.0升级应该是无痛的。然而,有些事情的改变可能会影响升级。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned previously, on most servers upgrading from 5.5 should be painless. However, there are some things that have changed which could affect an upgrade:
trans-unit.target: 如前所述,在大多数服务器上,从5.5升级应该是无痛的。然而,有些事情的改变可能会影响升级。

trans-unit.source: As noted in MDEV-4266, the mariadb-server and mariadb-client packages have a minor upgrade issue if you use 'apt-get install mariadb-server' or 'apt-get install mariadb-client' to upgrade them instead of the more common 'apt-get upgrade'. This is because those two packages depend on mariadb-server-5.5 and mariadb-client-5.5 with no specific version of those packages. For example, if you have the mariadb-server package installed, version 5.5.29 and you install version 5.5.30 of that package it will not automatically upgrade the mariadb-server-5.5 package to version 5.5.30 like you would expect because the 5.5.29 version of that package satisfies the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 如MDEV-4266中所述，如果您使用“ apt-get install mariadb-server ”或“ apt-get install mariadb-client ”而不是其他升级包，则 mariadb-server 和 mariadb-client 软件包存在较小的升级问题。常见的“ apt-get upgrade ”。这是因为这两个软件包依赖于 mariadb-server-5.5 和 mariadb-client-5.5 ，而没有这些软件包的特定版本。例如，如果您安装了 mariadb-server 版的mariadb-server软件包，并且安装了该软件包的5.5.30版，它将不会自动升级 mariadb-server-5.5 像预期的那样将其打包到5.5.30版本，因为该软件包的5.5.29版本满足了依赖性。

trans-unit.source: As noted on the Preparing guide, you can installing MariaDB ColumnStore with the use of soft-links. If you have the softlinks be setup at the Data Directory Levels, like mariadb/columnstore/data and mariadb/columnstore/dataX, then your upgrade will happen without any issues. In the case where you have a softlink at the top directory, like /usr/local/mariadb, you will need to upgrade using the binary package. If you updating using the rpm package and tool, this softlink will be deleted when you perform the upgrade process and the upgrade will fail.
trans-unit.target: 正如在准备指南中所提到的,你可以使用软链接来安装MariaDB ColumnStore,如果你把软链接设置在Data Directory级别,比如mariadb/columnstore/data和mariadb/columnstore/dataX,那么你的升级就不会有任何问题。如果你把软链接设置在数据目录级别,比如mariadb/columnstore/data和mariadb/columnstore/dataX,那么你的升级就不会有任何问题。如果你在顶部目录有软链接,比如/usr/local/mariadb,你就需要使用二进制包升级。如果你使用rpm包和工具进行升级,这个软链接会在升级过程中被删除,升级会失败。

trans-unit.source: As of file systems: currently XFS is expected to yield the best performance with MariaDB. However depending on the exact kernel version and version of XFS code in use, one might be affected by a bug that severely limits XFS performance in concurrent environments. This has been fixed in kernel versions above 3.5 or RHEL6 kernels kernel-2.6.32-358 or later (because of bug 807503 being fixed).
trans-unit.target: 从文件系统开始：当前，XFS有望在MariaDB上产生最佳性能。但是，取决于所使用的确切内核版本和XFS代码的版本，可能会受到严重限制并发环境中XFS性能的错误的影响。此问题已在高于3.5的内核版本或RHEL6内核kernel-2.6.32-358或更高版本中得到修复（由于已修复错误807503）。

trans-unit.source: As stated, a DELETE statement with no WHERE clause deletes all rows. A faster way to do this, when you do not need to know the number of deleted rows, is to use TRUNCATE TABLE. However, within a transaction or if you have a lock on the table, TRUNCATE TABLE cannot be used whereas DELETE can. See TRUNCATE TABLE, and LOCK.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，没有 WHERE 子句的 DELETE 语句将删除所有行。当您不需要知道已删除的行数时，一种更快的方法是使用 TRUNCATE TABLE 。但是，在事务内或如果您在表上有锁，则不能使用 TRUNCATE TABLE ，而可以使用 DELETE 。请参见 TRUNCATE TABLE 和 LOCK 。

trans-unit.source: As was shown above, Multi Range Read requires sort buffers to operate. The size of the buffers is limited by system variables. If MRR has to process more data than it can fit into its buffer, it will break the scan into multiple passes. The more passes are made, the less is the speedup though, so one needs to balance between having too big buffers (which consume lots of memory) and too small buffers (which limit the possible speedup).
trans-unit.target: 如上图所示,多范围读取需要排序缓冲区来操作。缓冲区的大小受到系统变量的限制。如果MRR要处理的数据超过了它的缓冲区所能容纳的数量,它就会把扫描分成多个通道。不过次数越多,速度越慢,所以需要在缓冲区过大(会消耗大量内存)和缓冲区过小(会限制可能的速度)之间取得平衡。

trans-unit.source: As we have seen above, a proper Pivot Table is made from an internal intermediate table resulting from the execution of a GROUP BY statement. In many cases, it is simpler or desirable to directly specify this when creating the pivot table. This may be because the source is the result of a complex process including filtering and/or joining tables.
trans-unit.target: 正如我们在上面看到的，一个正确的数据透视表是由执行 GROUP BY 语句产生的内部中间表制成的。在许多情况下，创建数据透视表时直接指定更为简单或更理想。这可能是因为源是包含筛选和/或联接表的复杂过程的结果。

trans-unit.source: As we have seen before, the partition engine currently loses the connection string. This is why it was specified as “connect” in the option list.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，分区引擎当前会丢失连接字符串。这就是为什么在选项列表中将其指定为“连接”的原因。

trans-unit.source: As we have seen, it is also safe to use it to create or drop indexes. Otherwise, a simple rule of thumb is to avoid altering a table definition and better drop and re-create a table whose definition must be modified. Just remember that for outward CONNECT tables, dropping a table does not erase the data and that creating it does not modify existing data.
trans-unit.target: 正如我们所看到的,使用它来创建或放弃索引也是安全的。否则,一个简单的经验法则是避免改变表的定义,最好放弃并重新创建一个必须修改定义的表。只需记住,对于向外的CONNECT表,丢弃表并不会删除数据,创建表也不会修改现有数据。

trans-unit.source: As with a regular SELECT, the WHERE clause can be used for the specific columns returned, and the LIKE clause with the regular wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 与常规 SELECT 一样， WHERE 子句可用于返回的特定列，而 LIKE 子句可用于常规通配符。

trans-unit.source: As with core MariaDB, ColumnStore employs “saturation semantics” on integer values. This means that if a value is inserted into an integer field that is too big/small for it to hold (i.e. it is more negative or more positive than the values indicated above), ColumnStore will “saturate” that value to the min/max value indicated above as appropriate. For example, for a SMALLINT column, if 32800 is attempted, the actual value inserted will be 32767.
trans-unit.target: 与核心MariaDB一样，ColumnStore在整数值上采用“饱和语义”。这意味着，如果将一个值插入到一个太大/太小而无法容纳的整数字段中（即，它比上面指示的值更负或更正），则ColumnStore会将该值“饱和”到最小值/最大值上面指出的适当值。例如，对于SMALLINT列，如果尝试使用32800，则插入的实际值将为32767。

trans-unit.source: As with most errors, first take a look at the contents of the MariaDB error log. If dealing with a deadlock, setting the innodb_print_all_deadlocks option (off by default) will output details of all deadlocks to the error log.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数错误一样，首先查看一下MariaDB错误日志的内容。如果处理死锁，则设置innodb_print_all_deadlocks选项（默认情况下为禁用）会将所有死锁的详细信息输出到错误日志。

trans-unit.source: As you can see in the examples above, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(constant-date-string) returns a timestamp with 6 decimals while MariaDB 5.2 and before returns it without decimals. This can cause a problem if you are using UNIX_TIMESTAMP() as a partitioning function. You can fix this by using FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(..)) or changing the date string to a date number, like 20080101000000.
trans-unit.target: 如您在上面的示例中看到的那样，UNIX_TIMESTAMP（constant-date-string）返回一个带有6个小数的时间戳，而MariaDB 5.2和之前的时间戳不带小数。如果将UNIX_TIMESTAMP（）用作分区函数，则可能导致问题。您可以通过使用FLOOR（UNIX_TIMESTAMP（..））或将日期字符串更改为日期数字（例如20080101000000）来解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Assisted discovery is a lot simpler from the server point of view, a lot more controlled. The table cannot appear or disappear at will, one still needs explicit DDL statements to manipulate it. There is only one new handlerton method that the server uses to discover the table structure when a user has issued an explicit CREATE TABLE statement without declaring any columns or indexes.
trans-unit.target: 从服务器的角度来看，辅助发现要简单得多，控制得多。该表不能随意出现或消失，仍然需要显式的DDL语句来对其进行操作。当用户发出显式的 CREATE TABLE 语句而不声明任何列或索引时，服务器仅使用一种新的handlerton方法来发现表结构。

trans-unit.source: At a technical level, purchasing of a milk carton or container triggers an OLTP query, and inventory reporting is an OLAP query. OLTP data is used for logging, and analysis of OLAP data drives understanding of product losses, replenishment patterns, and equipment failures.
trans-unit.target: 在技术层面上,购买一个牛奶盒或容器会触发一个OLTP查询,库存报告是一个OLAP查询。OLTP数据用于记录,对OLAP数据的分析可以推动对产品损耗、补货模式和设备故障的理解。

trans-unit.source: At a technical level, when an OLTP query is performed to process the customer's purchase, the customer's past and current purchase history is analyzed with an OLAP query to provide promotions tailored to the customer's buying history.
trans-unit.target: 在技术层面上,在进行OLTP查询处理客户购买时,通过OLAP查询分析客户过去和现在的购买历史,为客户的购买历史提供量身定做的促销活动。

trans-unit.source: At each DROP or ALTER, increase the counter by one.
trans-unit.target: 在每一次DROP或ALTER时,将计数器增加一个。

trans-unit.source: At its core, mysql-test is very simple. The client program mysqltest executes a test file and compares the produced output with the result file. If the files match, the test is passed; otherwise the test has failed. This approach can be used to test any SQL statement, as well as other executables (with the exec command).
trans-unit.target: 从本质上讲，mysql-test非常简单。客户端程序 mysqltest 执行一个测试文件，并将产生的输出与结果文件进行比较。如果文件匹配，则测试通过。否则，测试将失败。此方法可用于测试任何SQL语句以及其他可执行文件（使用 exec 命令）。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the 'in_to_exists' or 'materialization' optimizer_switch flags must be 'on'.

trans-unit.source: At least one symbol, beyond the required x() - corresponding to an SQL function X()) - is required. These can be x_init(), x_deinit(), xxx_reset(), x_clear() and x_add() functions (see Creating User-defined Functions). The allow-suspicious-udfs mysqld option (by default unset) provides a workaround, permitting only one symbol to be used. This is not recommended, as it opens the possibility of loading shared objects that are not legitimate user-defined functions.

trans-unit.source: At server startup, the server loads and initializes any plugin that is listed in the mysql.plugin table. This means that a plugin is installed with INSTALL PLUGIN only once, not every time the server starts. Plugin loading at startup does not occur if the server is started with the --skip-grant-tables option.
trans-unit.target: 服务器启动时，服务器将加载并初始化 mysql.plugin 表中列出的所有插件。这意味着一个插件只能用一次 INSTALL PLUGIN 安装，而不是每次服务器启动时都安装一次。如果使用 --skip-grant-tables 选项启动服务器，则不会在启动时加载插件。

trans-unit.source: At server startup, the server loads and initializes any plugin that is listed in the mysql.plugin table. This means that a plugin is installed with INSTALL SONAME only once, not every time the server starts. Plugin loading at startup does not occur if the server is started with the --skip-grant-tables option.
trans-unit.target: 服务器启动时，服务器将加载并初始化 mysql.plugin 表中列出的所有插件。这意味着插件仅在 INSTALL SONAME 中安装一次，而不是每次服务器启动时都安装一次。如果使用 --skip-grant-tables 选项启动服务器，则不会在启动时加载插件。

trans-unit.source: At view definition time, the view creator must have the privileges needed to use the top-level objects accessed by the view. For example, if the view definition refers to table columns, the creator must have privileges for the columns, as described previously. If the definition refers to a stored function, only the privileges needed to invoke the function can be checked. The privileges required when the function runs can be checked only as it executes: For different invocations of the function, different execution paths within the function might be taken.
trans-unit.target: 在定义视图时,视图创建者必须拥有使用视图所访问的顶层对象所需的权限。例如,如果视图定义指的是表列,那么创建者必须拥有前文所述的列的权限。如果定义指的是存储函数,则只能检查调用函数所需的权限。只有在函数执行时才能检查函数运行时所需的权限。对于函数的不同调用,可能会在函数内采取不同的执行路径。

trans-unit.source: Atomic groups produce faster false results (i.e. in case when a long subject string does not match the pattern), because the regexp engine saves performance on backtracking. However, don't hurry to put everything into atomic groups. This example demonstrates the difference between atomic and non-atomic match:

trans-unit.source: Attempting to change @@skip_replication in the middle of a transaction will fail; this is to avoid getting half of a transaction replicated while the other half is not replicated. Be sure to end any current transaction with COMMIT/ROLLBACK before changing the variable.

trans-unit.source: Automated system partitioning of columns is provided by ColumnStore. As data is loaded into extent maps, the system will capture and maintain min/max values of column data in that extent map. New rows are appended to each extent map until full at which point a new extent map is created. For column values that are ordered or semi-ordered this allows for very effective data partitioning. By using the min and max values, entire extent maps can be eliminated and not read to filter data. This generally works particularly well for time dimension / series data or similar values that increase over time.
trans-unit.target: ColumnStore提供了系统对列的自动分区功能。当数据加载到范围图中时,系统将捕获并维护该范围图中列数据的最小/最大值。新的行被附加到每个范围图中,直到满了为止,这时会创建一个新的范围图。对于有序或半有序的列值,这可以实现非常有效的数据分区。通过使用最小值和最大值,可以消除整个范围图,不读取过滤数据。这通常对时间维度/序列数据或随时间增加的类似值特别有效。

trans-unit.source: BACKUP LOCK blocks a table from DDL statements. This is mainly intended to be used by tools like mariabackup that need to ensure there are no DDLs on a table while the table files are opened. For example, for an Aria table that stores data in 3 files with extensions .frm, .MAI and .MAD. Normal read/write operations can continue as normal.
trans-unit.target: BACKUP LOCK阻止DDL语句中的表。这主要供mariabackup之类的工具使用，这些工​​具需要确保在打开表文件时表上没有DDL。例如，对于一个Aria表，它将数据存储在3个文件中，扩展名为.frm，.MAI和.MAD。正常的读/写操作可以照常继续。

trans-unit.source: BACKUP LOCK requires the RELOAD privilege.
trans-unit.target: BACKUP LOCK需要 RELOAD 特权。

trans-unit.source: BINARY values are right-padded with 0x00 (the zero byte) to the specified length when inserted. The padding is not removed on select, so this needs to be taken into account when sorting and comparing, where all bytes are significant. The zero byte, 0x00 is less than a space for comparison purposes.
trans-unit.target: 插入时，BINARY值将用 0x00 （零字节）右填充到指定的长度。选择时不会删除填充，因此在排序和比较时需要考虑到这一点，因为所有字节都是有效的。出于比较目的，零字节 0x00 小于空格。

trans-unit.source: BKA join interacts with the MRR functions respecting the following contract. The join procedure calls the MRR function multi_range_read_init passing it the callback functions that allows to initialize reading keys for the records in the join buffer and to iterate over these keys. It also passes the parameters of the buffer for MRR needs allocated within the join buffer space. Then BKA join repeatedly calls the MRR function multi_range_read_next. The function works as an iterator function over the records fetched by index look-ups with the keys produced by a callback function set in the call of multi_range_read_init. A call of the function multi_range_read_next returns the next fetched record through the dedicated record buffer, and the associated reference to the matched record from the join buffer as the output parameter of the function.
trans-unit.target: BKA join与MRR函数的交互遵循以下契约。join存储过程调用MRR函数multi_range_read_init,通过回调函数来初始化join缓冲区中记录的读取键,并对这些键进行迭代。它还传递了加入缓冲区空间内分配的MRR需要的缓冲区的参数。然后BKA join反复调用MRR函数multi_range_read_next。该函数作为一个迭代函数,在通过索引查找获取的记录上工作,其键是在调用multi_range_read_init时设置的回调函数产生的。调用函数multi_range_read_next通过专用的记录缓冲区返回下一条获取的记录,并从join缓冲区返回匹配记录的相关引用作为函数的输出参数。

trans-unit.source: Backup assistance. Backups can more easily be run if a server is not actively changing the data. A common scenario is to replicate the data to slave, which is then disconnected from the master with the data in a stable state. Backup is then performed from this server. See Replication as a Backup Solution.

trans-unit.source: Backups can have a significant effect on a server, and a high-availability master may not be able to be stopped, locked or simply handle the extra load of a backup. Running the backup from a slave has the advantage of being able to shutdown or lock the slave and perform a backup without any impact on the primary server.
trans-unit.target: 备份会对服务器产生重大影响,高可用性主服务器可能无法停止、锁定或简单处理备份的额外负载。从从机运行备份的好处是可以关闭或锁定从机,在不影响主服务器的情况下进行备份。

trans-unit.source: Basically, the purpose of the MariaDB Audit Plugin is to log the server's activity. For each client session, it records who connected to the server (i.e., user name and host), what queries were executed, and which tables were accessed and server variables that were changed. This information is stored in a rotating log file or it may be sent to the local syslogd.
trans-unit.target: 基本上，MariaDB Audit Plugin的目的是记录服务器的活动。对于每个客户端会话，它记录谁连接到服务器（即用户名和主机），执行了哪些查询，访问了哪些表以及更改了服务器变量。此信息存储在循环日志文件中，或者可以将其发送到本地 syslogd 。

trans-unit.source: Batch Key Access Join

trans-unit.source: Batch Keys Access join algorithm performs index look-ups when looking for possible matching candidates provided by the second join operand. With this respect the algorithm behave itself as the regular join algorithm. Yet BKA performs index look-ups for a batch of the records from the join buffer. For conventional database engines like InnoDB/MyISAM it allows to fetch matching candidates in an optimal way. For the engines with remote data store such as FederateX/Spider the algorithm allows to save on transfers between the MySQL node and the data store nodes.
trans-unit.target: 批量键访问连接算法在寻找由第二个连接操作数提供的可能匹配的候选者时,执行索引查找。在这一点上,该算法与普通的连接算法一样。然而,BKA是对加入缓冲区中的一批记录进行索引查找。对于传统的数据库引擎,如InnoDB/MyISAM,它允许以最佳方式获取匹配的候选记录。对于具有远程数据存储的引擎,如FederateX/Spider,该算法允许节省MySQL节点和数据存储节点之间的传输。

trans-unit.source: Be careful changing the binary log format dynamically when the server is a slave and parallel replication is enabled. If you change the global value dynamically, then that does not also affect the session values of any currently running threads. This can cause problems with parallel replication, because the worker threads will remain running even after STOP SLAVE is executed. This can be worked around by resetting the slave_parallel_threads system variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当服务器为从属服务器并启用并行复制时，请小心动态更改二进制日志格式。如果您动态更改全局值，那么这也不会影响任何当前正在运行的线程的会话值。这可能会导致并行复制出现问题，因为即使执行 STOP SLAVE 之后，工作线程仍将保持运行状态。可以通过重置 slave_parallel_threads 系统变量来解决此问题。例如：

trans-unit.source: Be careful to process multiple log files in a single connection, especially if one or more of them have any CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE ... statements. Temporary tables are dropped when the mysql client terminates, so if you are processing multiple log files one at a time (i.e. multiple connections) and one log file creates a temporary table and then a subsequent log file refers to the table you will get an 'unknown table' error.
trans-unit.target: 注意在单个连接中处理多个日志文件，尤其是其中一个或多个具有任何 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE ... 语句时。当mysql客户端终止时，临时表将被删除，因此，如果您一次处理多个日志文件（即多个连接），并且一个日志文件创建一个临时表，然后后续的日志文件引用该表，您将获得一个'未知表格错误。

trans-unit.source: Be careful using the ALTER TABLE statement. Currently the data compatibility is not tested and the modified definition can become incompatible with the data. In particular, Alter modifies the table definition only but does not modify the table data. Consequently, the table type should not be modified this way, except to correct an incorrect definition. Also adding, dropping or modifying columns may be wrong because the default offset values (when not explicitly given by the FLAG option) may be wrong when recompiled with missing columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用ALTER TABLE语句时要小心。当前，数据兼容性未经过测试，修改后的定义可能与数据不兼容。特别是，Alter仅修改表定义，但不修改表数据。因此，除非更正了错误的定义，否则不应以这种方式修改表类型。同样，添加，删除或修改列也可能是错误的，因为当使用缺少的列重新编译时，默认偏移值（当FLAG选项未明确给出时）可能是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Be careful when changing the binary log format when using replication. When you change the binary log format on a server, it only changes the format for that server. Changing the binary log format on a master has no effect on the slave's binary log format. This can cause replication to give inconsistent results or to fail.
trans-unit.target: 使用复制时，更改二进制日志格式时要小心。当您更改服务器上的二进制日志格式时，它只会更改该服务器的格式。更改主机上的二进制日志格式不会影响从站的二进制日志格式。这可能会导致复制产生不一致的结果或失败。

trans-unit.source: Bear in mind, before you can restore a backup, you first need to run Mariabackup with the --prepare option. Once the backup is prepared, you can run --copy-back to apply it to MariaDB Server.

trans-unit.source: Bear in mind, before you can restore a backup, you first need to run Mariabackup with the --prepare option. Once the backup is prepared, you can run --move-back to apply it to MariaDB Server.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，然后才能恢复备份，首先需要与运行Mariabackup --prepare 选项。在完全备份的情况下，这会使文件的时间点保持一致。对于增量备份，这会将增量应用于基本备份。准备好备份后，可以运行 --move-back 将其应用于MariaDB Server。

trans-unit.source: Because MariaDB needs to connect to the AWS KMS service, you must ensure that the host has outbound network connectivity over port 443 to AWS and you must ensure that local policies allow the MariaDB server process to make those outbound connections. By default, SELinux restricts MariaDB from making such connections.
trans-unit.target: 因为MariaDB需要连接到AWS KMS服务,所以你必须确保主机通过443端口向AWS提供出站网络连接,而且你必须确保本地策略允许MariaDB服务器进程进行这些出站连接。默认情况下,SELinux限制MariaDB进行此类连接。

trans-unit.source: Because SYSDATE() can return different values even within the same statement, and is not affected by SET TIMESTAMP, it is non-deterministic and therefore unsafe for replication if statement-based binary logging is used. If that is a problem, you can use row-based logging, or start the server with the mysqld option --sysdate-is-now to cause SYSDATE() to be an alias for NOW(). The non-deterministic nature of SYSDATE() also means that indexes cannot be used for evaluating expressions that refer to it, and that statements using the SYSDATE() function are unsafe for statement-based replication.
trans-unit.target: 因为SYSDATE（）甚至可以在同一条语句中返回不同的值，并且不受SET TIMESTAMP的影响，所以它是不确定性的，因此如果使用基于语句的二进制日志记录，则对于复制是不安全的。如果存在问题，则可以使用基于行的日志记录，或者使用mysqld选项--sysdate-is-now启动服务器，以使SYSDATE（）成为NOW（）的别名。 SYSDATE（）的不确定性也意味着索引不能用于评估引用它的表达式，并且使用SYSDATE（）函数的语句对于基于语句的复制是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: Because a BLACKHOLE table does not store data, it will not maintain the AUTO_INCREMENT value. If you are replicating to a table that can handle AUTO_INCREMENT columns, and are not explicitly setting the primary key auto-increment value in the INSERT query, or using the SETINSERT_ID statement, inserts will fail on the slave due to duplicate keys.
trans-unit.target: 因为BLACKHOLE表不存储数据，所以它将不维护 AUTO_INCREMENT 值。如果要复制到可以处理 AUTO_INCREMENT 列的表，并且没有在 INSERT 查询中显式设置主键自动递增值，或者没有使用 SET INSERT_ID 语句，则由于键重复，因此在从属服务器上的插入将失败。

trans-unit.source: Because all files are handled by the standard input/output functions of the operating system, their size is limited to 2GB, the maximum size handled by standard functions. For some table types, CONNECT can deal with files that are larger than 2GB, or prone to become larger than this limit. These are the FIX, BIN and VEC types. To tell connect to use input/output functions dealing with big files, specify the option huge=1 or huge=YES for that table. Note however that CONNECT cannot randomly access tables having more than 2G records.
trans-unit.target: 由于所有文件均由操作系统的标准输入/输出功能处理，因此它们的大小限制为2GB，这是标准功能处理的最大大小。对于某些表类型，CONNECT可以处理大于2GB的文件，或者倾向于大于此限制的文件。这些是FIX，BIN和VEC类型。要告诉connect使用处理大文件的输入/输出功能，请为该表指定选项 huge=1 或 huge=YES 。但是请注意，CONNECT不能随机访问具有2G以上记录的表。

trans-unit.source: Because catalog tables are processed like the information retrieved by “Discovery” when table columns are not specified in a Create Table statement, their result set is entirely retrieved and memory allocated.
trans-unit.target: 当在Create Table语句中未指定表列时，由于目录表的处理方式类似于“发现”所检索的信息，因此将完全检索其结果集并分配内存。

trans-unit.source: Because it is an associative memory of finite size, sometimes there will be "misses" that require reaching into real RAM to resolve the lookup. This is costly, so should be avoided.

trans-unit.source: Because of the TABLE option, you may disable query logging and still know who accessed which tables. trans-unit.source: Because of these two benefits, it is generally recommended to use global transaction ID for any replication setups based on MariaDB 10.0.2 or later. However, old-style replication continues to work as always, so there is no pressing need to change existing setups. Global transaction ID integrates smoothly with old-style replication, and the two can be used freely together in the same replication hierarchy. There is no special configuration needed of the server to start using global transaction ID. However, it must be explicitly set for a slave server with the appropriate CHANGE MASTER option; by default old-style replication is used by a replication slave, to maintain backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 由于这两个优点，通常建议对基于MariaDB 10.0.2或更高版本的任何复制设置使用全局事务ID 。但是，旧式复制仍将一如既往地工作，因此无需迫切需要更改现有设置。全局事务ID可以与旧式复制顺利集成，并且可以在同一复制层次结构中自由地一起使用这两者。服务器不需要特殊配置即可开始使用全局事务ID。但是，必须使用适当的CHANGE MASTER选项为从属服务器显式设置它。默认情况下，复制从属服务器使用旧式复制来保持向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, an identical statement run on the master and the slave may result in different outcomes if the foreign key relations are not identical on both master and slave This could be the case if the storage engine on one supports cascading deletes (e.g. InnoDB) and the storage engine on the other does not (e.g. MyISAM), or the one has specified a foreign key relation, and the other hasn't.
trans-unit.target: 正因为如此,如果主、从机上的外键关系不完全相同,那么在主、从机上运行相同的语句可能会导致不同的结果,如果一个存储引擎支持级联删除(如InnoDB),而另一个存储引擎不支持(如MyISAM),或者一个存储引擎指定了外键关系,而另一个存储引擎没有指定外键关系,就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Because the boys table can be directly used, what can be the use of a proxy table? Well, its main use is to be internally used by other table types such as TBL, XCOL, OCCUR, or PIVOT. Sure enough, PROXY tables are CONNECT tables, meaning that they can be based on tables of any engines and accessed by table types that need to access CONNECT tables.
trans-unit.target: 因为可以直接使用boys表，所以可以使用代理表吗？好吧，它的主要用途是供其他类型的表内部使用，例如TBL，XCOL，OCCUR或PIVOT。果然，PROXY表是CONNECT表，这意味着它们可以基于任何引擎的表，并可以通过需要访问CONNECT表的表类型进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Because the following variable only has a global scope, the global value is returned even when specifying SESSION (in this case by default):
trans-unit.target: 因为下面的变量只有一个全局范围,所以即使指定了SESSION(在这种情况下是默认的),也会返回全局值。

trans-unit.source: Because the partition engine was written before some other engines were added to MariaDB, the way it works is sometime incompatible with these engines, in particular with CONNECT.
trans-unit.target: 因为分区引擎是在MariaDB加入其他一些引擎之前写的,所以它的工作方式有时与这些引擎不兼容,特别是与CONNECT不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Because the table is accessed several times, this can make queries last very long except for small tables and is almost unacceptable for big tables. However, if it cannot be avoided, using the memory method is the best choice and can be more than four times faster than the default method. If it is supported by the driver, using a scrollable cursor is slightly slower than using memory but can be an alternative to avoid memory problems when the sub-query returns a huge result set.
trans-unit.target: 由于表被多次访问,除了小表外,会使查询持续很长时间,对于大表几乎不能接受。但是,如果无法避免,使用内存方式是最好的选择,可以比默认方式快4倍以上。如果驱动程序支持,使用可滚动游标比使用内存略慢,但当子查询返回一个巨大的结果集时,使用可滚动游标可以作为避免内存问题的一种选择。

trans-unit.source: Because the table is read sequentially when reconstructing the index there no need for MRR.
trans-unit.target: 因为在重建索引时,表是按顺序读取的,所以不需要MRR。

trans-unit.source: Because this type is mainly used by CONNECT to handle numeric or decimal fields of ODBC, JDBC and MySQL table types, CONNECT does not provide decimal calculations or comparison by itself. This is why decimal columns of CONNECT tables cannot be indexed.
trans-unit.target: 因为这个类型主要是CONNECT用来处理ODBC、JDBC和MySQL表类型的数字或十进制字段,CONNECT本身不提供十进制计算或比较。这就是为什么CONNECT表的小数列不能被索引的原因。

trans-unit.source: Because this would change the first name of both authors as they share the same ISBN.
trans-unit.target: 因为这样做会改变两个作者的名字,因为他们共享同一个ISBN。

trans-unit.source: Because we, the MariaDB developers, don't want to add a lot of new features or big code changes to a stable release, not all TokuDB features will be merged at once into MariaDB. Instead they will be added in stages.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们,MariaDB 开发者,不希望在一个稳定的版本中添加大量的新功能或大的代码变化,所以并不是所有 TokuDB 的功能都会一次性合并到 MariaDB 中。相反,它们将被分阶段添加到MariaDB中。

trans-unit.source: Because you are upgrading ColumnStore and not uninstalling it, they are not necessary. If at some point you wish to uninstall it, you (or your sysadmin) will have to perform those operations by hand.
trans-unit.target: 因为你是在升级ColumnStore,而不是卸载它,所以它们是不必要的。如果在某些时候你想卸载它,你(或你的系统管理员)将不得不手动执行这些操作。

trans-unit.source: Before "native partitions" (5.7.6), each partition consumed a chunk of memory.
trans-unit.target: 在 "原生分区"(5.7.6)之前,每个分区都会消耗一大块内存。

trans-unit.source: Before 10.0.10 the compression type did not default to the tokudb_row_format session variable. If COMPRESSION= was not included in CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE ENGINE=TokuDB then the TokuDB table was created uncompressed.
trans-unit.target: 在10.0.10之前，压缩类型未默认为tokudb_row_format会话变量。如果 COMPRESSION= 未包含在 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE ENGINE=TokuDB 中,则创建的TokuDB表未压缩。

trans-unit.source: Before 10.0.2, GET_LOCK() released the existing lock, if any. Since 10.0.2 this does not happen, because multiple locks are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 在10.0.2之前， GET_LOCK() 释放了现有的锁（如果有）。从10.0.2开始，不会发生这种情况，因为允许多个锁定。

trans-unit.source: Before PBXT has recovered, not all statistics are available. In particular, the statistics relating to PBXT background threads are not available (including the sweep and chkpnt statistics).
trans-unit.target: 在PBXT恢复之前，并非所有统计信息都可用。特别是，与PBXT后台线程有关的统计信息不可用（包括 sweep 和 chkpnt 统计信息）。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.0, InnoDB statistics were not stored on disk, meaning that on server restarts the statistics would need to be recalculated, which is both needless computation, as well as leading to inconsistent query plans.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0之前，InnoDB统计信息尚未存储在磁盘上，这意味着在服务器重新启动时，将需要重新计算统计信息，这既是不必要的计算，又会导致查询计划不一致。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.0, the MySQL/MariaDB optimizer relied on storage engines (e.g. InnoDB) to provide statistics for the query optimizer. This approach worked; however it had some deficiencies:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0之前，MySQL / MariaDB优化器依靠存储引擎（例如InnoDB）为查询优化器提供统计信息。这种方法行之有效；但是它有一些缺陷：

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.0, the doublewrite buffer can be moved to a different drive, reducing contention on random reads. Use the innodb_doublewrite_file system variable to specify a location. Since the doublewrite buffer is mostly sequential writes, a traditional HDD is a better choice than SSD. This variable was removed in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0之前，可以将双写缓冲区移动到其他驱动器，以减少随机读取时的争用。使用innodb_doublewrite_file系统变量指定位置。由于双写缓冲区主要是顺序写入，因此传统的HDD比SSD更佳。此变量已在MariaDB 10.0中删除。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.2, all MariaDB collations were of type PADSPACE, meaning that VARCHAR (as well as CHAR and TEXT values) are compared without regard for trailing spaces. This does not apply to the LIKE pattern-matching operator, which takes into account trailing spaces. From MariaDB 10.2, a number of NO PAD collations are available.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2之前，所有MariaDB 归类均为 PADSPACE 类型，这意味着比较VARCHAR（以及CHAR和TEXT值）时无需考虑尾随空格。这不适用于考虑尾随空格的LIKE模式匹配运算符。从MariaDB 10.2起，可以使用许多NO PAD归类。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.2, all MariaDB collations were of type PADSPACE, meaning that TEXT (as well as VARCHAR and CHAR values) are compared without regard for trailing spaces. This does not apply to the LIKE pattern-matching operator, which takes into account trailing spaces.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2之前，所有MariaDB 归类均为PADSPACE类型，这意味着比较TEXT（以及VARCHAR和CHAR值）时无需考虑尾随空格。这不适用于考虑尾随空格的LIKE模式匹配运算符。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.2, all collations were of type PADSPACE, meaning that CHAR (as well as VARCHAR and TEXT) values are compared without regard for trailing spaces. This does not apply to the LIKE pattern-matching operator, which takes into account trailing spaces.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2之前，所有归类均为PADSPACE类型，这意味着不考虑尾随空格就比较了CHAR（以及VARCHAR和TEXT）值。这不适用于考虑尾随空格的LIKE模式匹配运算符。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 5.3/MySQL 5.6, the temporary table would never have any indexes, and the only way to read records from it would be a full table scan. Starting from the mentioned versions of the server, the optimizer has an option to create an index and use it for joins with other tables.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3 / MySQL 5.6 之前，临时表永远不会有任何索引，而从中读取记录的唯一方法是全表扫描。从提到的服务器版本开始，优化器可以选择创建索引并将其用于与其他表的联接。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 5.5 and before MySQL 5.6 one could also set sql_log_bin as a global variable. This has now been disabled as this was too dangerous as it could damage replication.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5之前和MySQL 5.6之前，还可以将 sql_log_bin 设置为全局变量。现在已禁用此功能，因为它太危险了，因为它可能会损坏复制。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 5.5, FRAC_SECOND was permitted as a synonym for MICROSECOND.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5之前，允许FRAC_SECOND作为MICROSECOND的同义词。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 5.5, each use of, for example, LOCK TABLE ... WRITE would increment In_use for that table. With the implementation of the metadata locking improvements in MariaDB 5.5, LOCK TABLE... WRITE acquires a strong MDL lock, and concurrent connections will wait on this MDL lock, so any subsequent LOCK TABLE... WRITE will not increment In_use.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5之前，每次使用LOCK TABLE ... WRITE都会增加该表的 In_use 值。随着MariaDB 5.5中元数据锁定实现的改进， LOCK TABLE... WRITE 获得了强大的MDL锁定，并且并发连接将等待此MDL锁定，因此任何后续的 LOCK TABLE... WRITE 都不会增加 In_use 。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 5.5, only inserted rows could be buffered, so this buffer was called Insert Buffer. The old name still appears in several places, for example in the output of SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5之前，只能缓存插入的行，因此该缓冲区称为插入缓冲区。旧名称仍然出现在多个位置，例如，在SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS的输出中。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 5.5, the DATA DIRECTORY table option was not supported for InnoDB. Since MariaDB 5.5 it is supported, but only in CREATE TABLE. INDEX DIRECTORY has no effect, since InnoDB does not use separate files for indexes. To better balance the workload through several disks, the paths of some InnoDB log files can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5之前，InnoDB不支持DATA DIRECTORY table选项。从MariaDB 5.5开始，仅在CREATE TABLE中受支持。INDEX DIRECTORY无效，因为InnoDB不会将单独的文件用于索引。为了更好地平衡多个磁盘上的工作负载，还可以更改某些InnoDB日志文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.0.1, it returned a comma-separated list of column numbers, not names.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.1之前，它返回以逗号分隔的列号列表，而不是名称。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.0.1: Return a comma-separated list of column numbers. After MariaDB 10.0.1: Return a comma-separated list of column names. The names are quoted with backticks.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.1之前：返回以逗号分隔的列号列表。在MariaDB 10.0.1之后：返回以逗号分隔的列名列表。名称用反引号引起来。

trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.2之前，连接只能持有一个锁：

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.0.23 and MariaDB 10.1.9, this function was called Json_Value, but was renamed to avoid clashing with the JSON_VALUE function.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.23和MariaDB 10.1.9之前，此函数称为Json_Value，但已重命名以避免与JSON_VALUE函数冲突。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.1.13, the CREATE ROLE statement was not permitted in prepared statements.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.13之前，已准备好的语句中不允许使用 CREATE ROLE 语句。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.1.13, the DROP ROLE statement was not permitted in prepared statements.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.13之前的版本中，不允许在准备好的语句中使用 DROP ROLE 语句。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.1.13, the REVOKE role statement was not permitted in prepared statements.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.13之前的版本中，准备好的语句中不允许使用 REVOKE role 语句。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.1.7, MariaDB (as well as versions of MySQL before MySQL 5.7) would silently convert it into a NOT NULL column with a default value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.7之前，MariaDB（以及MySQL 5.7之前的MySQL版本）会将其无提示转换为默认值为0的NOT NULL列。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.2.1, BLOB and TEXT columns could not be assigned a DEFAULT value. This restriction was lifted in MariaDB 10.2.1.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1之前，无法为 BLOB 和 TEXT 列分配DEFAULT值。MariaDB 10.2.1中取消了此限制。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.2.9, Mariabackup did not support the --export option. See MDEV-13466 about that. In earlier versions of MariaDB, this means that Mariabackup could not create .cfg files for InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces during the --prepare stage. You can still import file-per-table tablespaces without the .cfg files in many cases, so it may still be possible in those versions to restore partial backups or to restore individual tables and partitions with just the .ibd files. If you have a full backup and you need to create .cfg files for InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces, then you can do so by preparing the backup as usual without the --export option, and then restoring the backup, and then starting the server. At that point, you can use the server's built-in features to copy the transportable tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.9之前，Mariabackup不支持 --export 选项。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-13466。在早期版本MariaDB的，这意味着Mariabackup无法创建 .cfg 的文件InnoDB的文件，每个表的表空间中的 --prepare 阶段。您仍然可以导入文件，每个表的表空间，而不 .cfg 在许多情况下的文件，所以它仍然有可能在这些版本中，以恢复部分备份或恢复单个表和分区只用 .ibd 文件。如果您具有完整备份，则需要创建 .cfg 文件用于InnoDB每表文件表空间，那么您可以照常准备备份，而无需使用 --export 选项，然后还原备份，然后启动服务器。此时，您可以使用服务器的内置功能来复制可传输表空间。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.3.6, was VARCHAR(128)
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.6之前，是VARCHAR（128）

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.4.3, InnoDB's spatial indexes could not be encrypted. If an InnoDB table was encrypted and if it contained spatial indexes, then those indexes would be unencrypted.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3之前，无法加密 InnoDB的空间索引。如果一个InnoDB表被加密并且包含空间索引，那么这些索引将不会被加密。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.4.3, MariaDB did not enable the unix_socket authentication plugin by default.This is default in Debian, allowing passwordless login.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3之前的版本中，MariaDB 默认情况下未启用 unix_socket 身份验证插件。这在Debian中是默认设置，允许无密码登录。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10.4.7, MariaDB 10.3.17, MariaDB 10.2.26 and MariaDB 10.1.41, this plugin did not check user privileges. When it is enabled, any user can query the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.DISKS table and see all the information it provides.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.7，MariaDB 10.3.17，MariaDB 10.2.26和MariaDB 10.1.41之前，此插件不检查用户权限。启用后，任何用户都可以查询 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.DISKS 表并查看其提供的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: Before Engine Condition Push Down patch .
trans-unit.target: 发动机状态推倒补丁前 。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10, the table contained only the EVENT_NAME, COUNT_READ, COUNT_WRITE, SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_READ and SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_WRITE columns.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10之前，该表仅包含 EVENT_NAME ， COUNT_READ ， COUNT_WRITE ， SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_READ 和 SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_WRITE 列。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10, the table contained only the FILE_NAME, EVENT_NAME, COUNT_READ, COUNT_WRITE, SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_READ and SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_WRITE columns.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10之前，该表仅包含 FILE_NAME ， EVENT_NAME ， COUNT_READ ， COUNT_WRITE ， SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_READ 和 SUM_NUMBER_OF_BYTES_WRITE 列。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB 10, the third step was also performed by the SQL thread; this meant that only one event could execute at a time, and replication was essentially single-threaded. Since MariaDB 10, the third step can optionally be performed by a pool of separate replication worker threads, and thereby potentially increase replication performance by applying multiple events in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10之前,第三步也是由SQL线程执行的;这意味着一次只能执行一个事件,复制基本上是单线程的。自从MariaDB 10之后,第三步可以选择由一个独立的复制工作线程池来执行,从而有可能通过并行应用多个事件来提高复制性能。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB can be installed, you also have to import the GPG public key that is used to verify the digital signatures of the packages in our repositories. This allows the apt utility to verify the integrity of the packages that it installs.
trans-unit.target: 在安装MariaDB之前，您还必须导入GPG公共密钥，该公共密钥用于验证我们存储库中软件包的数字签名。这允许 apt 实用程序验证其安装的软件包的完整性。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB can be installed, you also have to import the GPG public key that is used to verify the digital signatures of the packages in our repositories. This allows the yum, dnf and rpm utilities to verify the integrity of the packages that they install.
trans-unit.target: 在安装MariaDB之前，您还必须导入GPG公共密钥，该公共密钥用于验证我们存储库中软件包的数字签名。这使 yum ， dnf 和 rpm 实用程序可以验证它们安装的软件包的完整性。

trans-unit.source: Before MariaDB can be installed, you also have to import the GPG public key that is used to verify the digital signatures of the packages in our repositories. This allows the the zypper and rpm utilities to verify the integrity of the packages that they install.
trans-unit.target: 在安装MariaDB之前，您还必须导入GPG公共密钥，该公共密钥用于验证我们存储库中软件包的数字签名。这使 zypper 和 rpm 实用程序可以验证它们安装的软件包的完整性。

trans-unit.source: Before MySQL 5.1.13, stored procedures that take no arguments required parentheses. In current releases of MariaDB, CALL p() and CALL p are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL 5.1.13之前，不带参数的存储过程必须带括号。在当前的MariaDB版本中， CALL p() 和 CALL p 是等效的。

trans-unit.source: Before MySQL 5.1.33, a plugin was started with each option set to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL 5.1.33之前,启动插件时,每个选项都设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Before a modules can be added, the system must be ACTIVE or OFFLINE. Once added, they can be placed in-service with the alterSystem-Enable command.
trans-unit.target: 在添加模块之前，系统必须是ACTIVE或OFFLINE。添加后，可以使用alterSystem-Enable命令将它们投入使用。

trans-unit.source: Before a row is inserted or updated, all constraints are evaluated in the order they are defined. If any constraint expression returns false, then the row will not be inserted or updated. One can use most deterministic functions in a constraint, including UDFs.
trans-unit.target: 在插入或更新行之前，将按照定义的顺序评估所有约束。如果任何约束表达式返回false，则不会插入或更新该行。一个人可以在约束中使用大多数确定性函数，包括UDF。

trans-unit.source: Before a row is inserted or updated, all constraints are evaluated in the order they are defined. If any constraint fails, then the row will not be updated. One can use most deterministic functions in a constraint, including UDF's.
trans-unit.target: 在插入或更新行之前，将按照定义的顺序评估所有约束。如果任何约束失败，则该行将不会更新。一个人可以在约束中使用大多数确定性函数，包括UDF。

trans-unit.source: Before a row is inserted or updated, all constraints are evaluated in the order they are defined. If any constraints fails, then the row will not be updated. One can use most deterministic functions in a constraint, including UDFs.
trans-unit.target: 在插入或更新行之前，将按照定义的顺序评估所有约束。如果任何约束失败，则该行将不会更新。一个人可以在约束中使用大多数确定性函数，包括UDF。

trans-unit.source: Before a row is modified, it is copied into the undo log. Each normal row contains a pointer to the most recent version of the same row in the undo log. Each row in the undo log contains a pointer to previous version, if any. So, each modified row has an history chain.
trans-unit.target: 在修改行之前,它会被复制到撤销日志中。每条正常的行都包含一个指向撤销日志中同一行的最新版本的指针。撤销日志中的每一条记录都包含一个指向以前版本的指针(如果有的话)。所以,每一条修改过的行都有一个历史链。

trans-unit.source: Before adding modules or DBRoots
trans-unit.target: 在添加模块或DBRoots之前

trans-unit.source: Before any operation with a JDBC driver can be made, CONNECT must initialize the environment that will make working with Java possible. This will consist of:
trans-unit.target: 在对JDBC驱动程序进行任何操作之前,CONNECT必须先初始化环境,以使Java工作成为可能。这将包括:

trans-unit.source: Before beginning the binary tar file installation you will need your system administrator to set up accounts for you on every MariaDB Columnstore node. The account name & password must be the same on every node. If you change the password on one node, you must change it on every node. The user ID must be the same on every node as well. In the examples below we will use the account name 'mysql' and the password 'mariadb'.
trans-unit.target: 在开始安装二进制tar文件之前，您将需要系统管理员在每个MariaDB Columnstore节点上为您设置帐户。每个节点上的帐户名和密码必须相同。如果在一个节点上更改密码，则必须在每个节点上更改密码。每个节点上的用户ID也必须相同。在下面的示例中，我们将使用帐户名“ mysql”和密码“ mariadb”。

trans-unit.source: Before beginning the binary tar file installation you will need your system administrator to set up accounts for you on every MariaDB Columnstore node. The account name must be the same on every node. The password used must be the same on every node. If you subsequently change the password on one node, you must change it on every node. The user-id must be the same on every node as well. In the examples below we will use the account name 'guest' and the password 'mariadb'. Additionally, every node must have a basic Linux server package setup and additionally have expect (and all its dependencies) installed.
trans-unit.target: 在开始安装二进制焦油文件之前,你需要你的系统管理员在每个MariaDB Columnstore节点上为你设置账户。每个节点上的账户名称必须是相同的。在每个节点上使用的密码必须是相同的。如果你随后在一个节点上更改了密码,你必须在每个节点上更改密码。每个节点上的用户ID也必须是相同的。在下面的例子中,我们将使用账户名 "guest "和密码 "mariadb"。此外,每个节点都必须有一个基本的Linux服务器包设置,并且另外安装了expect(和所有的依赖)。

trans-unit.source: Before changing either of these values from their defaults, make sure you understand the impact and how your system currently uses the buffer. Their main reason for existence is to reduce the impact of full table scans, which are usually infrequent, but large, and previously could clear everything from the buffer. Setting a non-zero delay could help in situations where full table scans are performed in quick succession.
trans-unit.target: 在从默认值中改变其中任何一个值之前,请确保你了解其影响以及你的系统目前如何使用缓冲区。它们存在的主要原因是为了减少全表扫描的影响,全表扫描通常不经常进行,但规模很大,以前可能会从缓冲区中清除一切。设置一个非零的延迟可以在快速连续执行全表扫描的情况下有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Before table discovery was introduced, MariaDB used .frm files to store the table definition. But now the engine can store the table definition (if the engine supports automatic discovery, of course), and .frm files become redundant. Still, the server can use .frm files for such an engine — but they are no longer the only source of the table definition. Now .frm files are merely a cache of the table definition, while the original authoritative table definition is stored in the engine. Like any cache, its purpose is to reduce discovery attempts for a table. The engine decides whether it makes sense to cache table definition in the .frm file or not (see the second argument for the TABLE_SHARE::init_from_binary_frm_image()). For example, the Archive engine uses .frm cache, while the Sequence engine does not. In other words, MariaDB creates .frm files for Archive tables, but not for Sequence tables.
trans-unit.target: 在引入表发现之前，MariaDB使用 .frm 文件存储表定义。但是现在引擎可以存储表定义（当然，如果引擎支持自动发现） .frm 文件将变得多余。服务器仍然可以将 .frm 文件用于这种引擎-但它们不再是表定义的唯一来源。现在， .frm 文件仅是表定义的缓存，而原始的权威表定义存储在引擎中。与任何高速缓存一样，其目的是减少对表的发现尝试。引擎将决定在 .frm 中缓存表定义是否有意义是否文件（请参阅 TABLE_SHARE::init_from_binary_frm_image() 的第二个参数）。例如，存档引擎使用 .frm 缓存，而序列引擎则不使用。换句话说，MariaDB 为存档表而不是序列表创建 .frm 文件。

trans-unit.source: Before the data is dumped into LSM file, it is stored in the MemTable. MemTable doesn't allow computing index cardinalities, but it can provide an approximate number of rows in the table. Use of MemTable data for statistics is controlled by rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats; the default value is ON.
trans-unit.target: 在将数据转储到LSM文件之前，它已存储在MemTable中。MemTable不允许计算索引基数，但可以提供表中大约的行数。使用MemTable数据进行统计是由rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats控制的；默认值为 ON 。

trans-unit.source: Before using mysqld_multi be sure that you understand the meanings of the options that are passed to the mysqld servers and why you would want to have separate mysqld processes. Beware of the dangers of using multiple mysqld servers with the same data directory. Use separate data directories, unless you know what you are doing. Starting multiple servers with the same data directory does not give you extra performance in a threaded system.
trans-unit.target: 在使用mysqld_multi之前,请确保你理解传递给mysqld服务器的选项的含义,以及为什么你要有单独的mysqld进程。小心使用多个mysqld服务器和同一个数据目录的危险。使用单独的数据目录,除非你知道自己在做什么。用同一个数据目录启动多个服务器并不能给你在线程系统中带来额外的性能。

trans-unit.source: Before writing a compressed page into a data file, InnoDB writes it into the redo log. This ensures that the redo log can always be used to recover tables after a crash, even if the compression library is updated and some incompatibilities are introduced. But this also means that the redo log will grow faster and might need more space, or the frequency of checkpoints might need to increase.
trans-unit.target: 在将压缩页写入数据文件之前，InnoDB会将其写入重做日志。这样可以确保即使更新了压缩库并且引入了一些不兼容性，重做日志也始终可以在崩溃后用于恢复表。但这也意味着重做日志将增长更快，并且可能需要更多空间，或者可能需要增加检查点的频率。

trans-unit.source: Before you can restore from a backup, you first need to prepare it to make the data files consistent. You can do so with the --prepare command option.
trans-unit.target: 从备份还原之前，首先需要准备它以使数据文件一致。您可以使用 --prepare 命令选项执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Before you can restore from a backup, you first need to prepare it to make the data files consistent. You can do so with the --prepare option.
trans-unit.target: 从备份还原之前，首先需要准备它以使数据文件一致。您可以使用 --prepare 选项进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Before you restart the server, you may also want to set the --skip-slave-start option in a server option group in an option file. This option prevents the slave threads from restarting automatically when the server starts. Instead, they will have to be restarted manually.
trans-unit.target: 重新启动服务器之前，您可能还希望在选项文件的服务器选项组中设置 --skip-slave-start 选项。此选项可防止从属线程在服务器启动时自动重新启动。而是，它们将必须手动重新启动。

trans-unit.source: Before you start building MariaDB, you first need to install the build dependencies required to run the compile. CentOS provides a tool for installing build dependencies. The yum-builddep utility reads a package and generates a list of the packages required to build from source, then calls YUM to install them for you. In the event that this utility is not available on your system, you can install it through the yum-utils package. Once you have it, install the MariaDB build dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 在开始构建MariaDB之前，首先需要安装运行编译所需的构建依赖关系。CentOS提供了一个用于安装构建依赖项的工具。该 yum-builddep 工具读取一个包，并从产生源所需打造的包的列表，然后调用YUM安装它们。如果您的系统上没有该实用程序，则可以通过 yum-utils 软件包进行安装。拥有后，安装MariaDB构建依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Before you uninstall the plugin, you should ensure that data-at-rest encryption is completely disabled, and that MariaDB no longer needs the plugin to decrypt tables or other files.
trans-unit.target: 在卸载插件之前，您应该确保完全禁用静态数据加密，并且MariaDB不再需要插件来解密表或其他文件。

trans-unit.source: Before you upgrade, it would be best to take a backup of your database. This is always a good idea to do before an upgrade. We would recommend Percona XtraBackup.
trans-unit.target: 升级之前，最好对数据库进行备份。在升级之前，这始终是一个好主意。我们建议使用Percona XtraBackup。

trans-unit.source: Before you upgrade, it would be best to take a backup of your database. This is always a good idea to do before an upgrade. We would recommend Mariabackup.

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.1, Galera Cluster ships with the MariaDB Server. Upgrading a Galera Cluster node is very similar to upgrading a server from MariaDB 10.1 to MariaDB 10.2. For more information on that process as well as incompatibilities between versions, see the Upgrade Guide.

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.1, Galera Cluster ships with the MariaDB Server. Upgrading a Galera Cluster node is very similar to upgrading a server from MariaDB 10.2 to MariaDB 10.3. For more information on that process as well as incompatibilities between versions, see the Upgrade Guide.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1开始，Galera Cluster随MariaDB服务器一起提供。升级Galera Cluster节点与将服务器从MariaDB 10.2升级到MariaDB 10.3非常相似。有关该过程以及版本之间的不兼容性的更多信息，请参见《升级指南》。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.1, Galera Cluster ships with the MariaDB Server. Upgrading a Galera Cluster node is very similar to upgrading a server from MariaDB 10.3 to MariaDB 10.4. For more information on that process as well as incompatibilities between versions, see the Upgrade Guide.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1开始，Galera Cluster随MariaDB服务器一起提供。升级Galera Cluster节点与将服务器从MariaDB 10.3升级到MariaDB 10.4非常相似。有关该过程以及版本之间的不兼容性的更多信息，请参见《升级指南》。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.4, where the encryption key management plugin supports key rotation the InnoDB Redo Log can also rotate encryption keys. In previous releases, the Redo Log can only use the first encryption key.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.4开始，该版本的加密密钥管理插件支持密钥旋转，InnoDB Redo Log也可以旋转加密密钥。在以前的版本中，重做日志只能使用第一个加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.4, you can control the ordering of execution on table operations using parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.4开始，您可以使用括号控制表操作的执行顺序。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.5, there is a fatal error generated when trying to create a generated column whose value can change depending on the SQL Mode when its data is PERSISTENT or indexed.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.5开始，尝试创建已生成的列时会发生致命错误，当列的数据为 PERSISTENT 或已建立索引时，列的值可能会根据 SQL Mode 改变。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 5.3, the slave will try to choose a good index among any available:
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.3开始，从服务器将尝试在任何可用索引中选择一个良好的索引：

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 10.4.8, MariaDB 10.3.18, and MariaDB 10.2.27 a potentially inconsistent generated column outputs a warning when created or first used (without restricting their creation).
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.4.8，MariaDB 10.3.18和MariaDB 10.2.27开始，生成的潜在不一致的列在创建或首次使用时会输出警告（不限制其创建）。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in MariaDB 5.5.21, there is a LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED optimization which provides the means to terminate the execution of SELECT statements which examine too many rows, and thus use too many resources. See LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.5.21开始，存在LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED优化，它提供了一种方法来终止SELECT语句的执行，该语句检查过多的行，从而使用太多的资源。请参阅LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Aria 2.5, the plan is to focus on improving performance.
trans-unit.target: 从Aria 2.5开始,计划重点提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with MariaDB 5.3.0, the HandlerSocket plugin is included in both source and binary distributions.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.3.0开始，HandlerSocket插件包含在源代码和二进制发行版中。

trans-unit.source: Better practice, and the default in most situations, is to use a separate user, exclusively used for MariaDB. In most distributions, this user is called mysql.
trans-unit.target: 更好的做法（在大多数情况下为默认设置）是使用一个单独的用户，专门用于MariaDB。在大多数发行版中，此用户称为 mysql 。

trans-unit.source: Between TINYINT, SMALLINT, MEDIUMINT, INT and BIGINT. If lossy conversion is supported, the value from the master will be converted to the maximum or minimum permitted on the slave, which non-lossy conversions require the slave column to be large enough. For example, SMALLINT UNSIGNED can be converted to MEDIUMINT, but not SMALLINT SIGNED.
trans-unit.target: 在TINYINT，SMALLINT，MEDIUMINT，INT和BIGINT之间。如果支持有损转换，则来自主节点的值将转换为从节点上允许的最大值或最小值，而无损转换要求从节点列足够大。例如，SMALLINT UNSIGNED可以转换为MEDIUMINT，但不能转换为SMALLINT SIGNED。

trans-unit.source: Between major releases, there are often substantial changes, even if none of the new features are used. For example, both MariaDB 10.2 and MariaDB 10.3 introduce new versions of the redo log.
trans-unit.target: 在两个主要版本之间，即使没有使用任何新功能，也经常会进行重大更改。例如，MariaDB 10.2和MariaDB 10.3都引入了新版本的重做日志。

trans-unit.source: Between major versions of MariaDB various options supported by OLD_MODE may be removed. This is intentional as we assume that the application will be fixed to conform with the new MariaDB behavior between releases.
trans-unit.target: 在主要版本的MariaDB之间，可以删除 OLD_MODE 支持的各种选项。这是有意的，因为我们假设应用程序将被修复以符合发行版之间的新MariaDB行为。

trans-unit.source: Between the hardware and MariaDB sits the operating system, and there are a number of optimizations that can be made at this level
trans-unit.target: 在硬件和MariaDB之间坐着的是操作系统,在这个层面上可以做一些优化。

trans-unit.source: Beware of Proxies that try to implement a "read/write split". In some situations, a reference to LAST_INSERT_ID() will be sent to a "Slave".
trans-unit.target: 小心那些试图实现 "读/写分离 "的Proxies。在某些情况下,对LAST_INSERT_ID()的引用会被发送到 "Slave"。

trans-unit.source: Beware that DROP TABLE can drop both tables and sequences. This is mainly done to allow old tools like mysqldump to work with sequences.
trans-unit.target: 注意 DROP TABLE 可以同时删除表和序列。这样做主要是为了允许mysqldump等旧工具使用序列。

trans-unit.source: Beware that the database name in the URL can be interpreted differently depending on the DBMS. For MySQL this is the schema in which the tables are found. However, for Postgresql, this is the catalog and the schema must be specified using the CONNECT dbname option.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,URL中的数据库名称可以根据DBMS的不同而有不同的解释。对于MySQL来说,这是表所在的模式,但对于Postgresql来说,这是目录,必须使用CONNECT dbname选项指定模式。然而,对于Postgresql,这是目录,必须使用CONNECT dbname选项指定模式。

trans-unit.source: Beyond 100, you may be interfering replication and SELECTs.
trans-unit.target: 超过100,你可能会干扰复制和SELECTs。

trans-unit.source: Beyond 1000, you are into diminishing returns -- virtually no further performance gains.
trans-unit.target: 超过1000,您将进入收益递减的阶段--几乎没有进一步的性能提升。

trans-unit.source: Bit fields are automatically zero-padded from the left to the full length of the bit, so for example in a BIT(4) field, '10' is equivalent to '0010'.
trans-unit.target: 比特字段从左边开始自动加零到比特的全长,所以例如在BIT(4)字段中,'10'相当于'0010'。

trans-unit.source: Bit flag providing information about the foreign key.
trans-unit.target: 提供外键信息的位标志。

trans-unit.source: Bit values can be inserted with b'value' notation, where value is the bit value in 0's and 1's.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 b'value' 表示法插入位值，其中 value 是0和1的位值。

trans-unit.source: Bits
trans-unit.target: Bits

trans-unit.source: Bits are examined from right to left, (from low-order to high-order bits). Strings are added to the result from left to right, separated by a separator string (defaults as ','). You can optionally limit the number of bits the EXPORT_SET() function examines using the number_of_bits option.
trans-unit.target: 从右到左检查位（从低位到高位）。将字符串从左到右添加到结果中，并用分隔符字符串分隔（默认为' , '）。您可以选择使用 number_of_bits 选项限制 EXPORT_SET() 函数检查的位数。

trans-unit.source: Bits are returned as binary, so to display them, either add 0, or use a function such as HEX, OCT or BIN to convert them.
trans-unit.target: 位以二进制形式返回，因此要显示它们，可以加0或使用HEX，OCT或BIN之类的函数进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise AND
trans-unit.target: 位元 AND

trans-unit.source: Bitwise AND.
trans-unit.target: 位的AND。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise AND. Converts the values to binary and compares bits. Only if both the corresponding bits are 1 is the resulting bit also 1.
trans-unit.target: Bitwise AND。将数值转换为二进制并比较位。只有当对应的两个位都是1时,结果位也是1。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise NOT
trans-unit.target: 位智不

trans-unit.source: Bitwise NOT. Converts the value to 4 bytes binary and inverts all bits.
trans-unit.target: Bitwise NOT.将数值转换为4个字节的二进制,并将所有位数反转。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise OR
trans-unit.target: 位式OR

trans-unit.source: Bitwise OR.
trans-unit.target: 位的OR。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise OR. Converts the values to binary and compares bits. If either of the corresponding bits has a value of 1, the resulting bit is also 1.
trans-unit.target: Bitwise OR。将数值转换为二进制并比较位。如果对应的任何一个位的值为1,则结果位也为1。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise XOR
trans-unit.target: 位向XOR

trans-unit.source: Bitwise XOR.
trans-unit.target: 位XOR。

trans-unit.source: Bitwise XOR. Converts the values to binary and compares bits. If one (and only one) of the corresponding bits is 1 is the resulting bit also 1.
trans-unit.target: Bitwise XOR。将数值转换为二进制并比较位。如果对应的位中有一个(且只有一个)是1,则结果位也是1。

trans-unit.target: 嵌套环路加盟

trans-unit.source: Block based hash join algorithm is a new option to be used for join operations in MariaDB 5.3. It can be employed in the cases when there are equi-join sub-condition for the joined tables, in the other words when equalities of the form t2.f1= e1(t1),...,t2.fn=en(t1) can be extracted from the full join condition. As any block based join algorithm this one used a join buffer filled with the records of the first operand and looks through the records of the second operand to find matches for the records in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 基于块的哈希联接算法是MariaDB 5.3中用于联接操作的新选项。当联接表存在等联接子条件时，换句话说，当等式形式为t2.f1 = e1（t1），...，t2.fn = en（t1）时，可以使用它。 ）可以从完全加入条件中提取。作为任何基于块的联接算法，它使用填充有第一个操作数的记录的联接缓冲区，并浏览第二个操作数的记录，以查找缓冲区中记录的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Block hash join
trans-unit.target: 块状哈希加入

trans-unit.source: Block indexing can be done in two ways. Keeping the min/max values existing for each block, or keeping a bitmap allowing knowing what column distinct values are met in each blocks. This second ways often gives a better optimization, except for sorted columns for which both are equivalent. The bitmap approach can be done only on columns having not too many distinct values. This is estimated by the MAX _ DIST option value associated to the column when creating the table. <del>Bitmap block indexing will be used if this number is not greater than the MAXBMP setting for the database</del>.
trans-unit.target: 块索引可以通过两种方式完成。保持每个块的最小/最大值存在，或者保留一个位图，以允许知道每个块中满足哪些列的不同值。第二种方法通常可以提供更好的优化效果，但排序后的列是等效的。位图方法只能在没有太多不同值的列上完成。这是通过在创建表时与列关联的MAX _ DIST选项值来估计的。<del>如果该数字不大于数据库的MAXBMP设置，将使用位图块索引</del>。

trans-unit.source: Block indexing is internally handled by CONNECT while reading sequentially a table data. This means in particular that when standard indexing is used on a table, block indexing is not used.
trans-unit.target: 当按顺序读取表数据时,块索引由CONNECT内部处理。这特别意味着,当表上使用标准索引时,不使用块索引。

trans-unit.source: Both "Top-n" formulations probably take about the same amount of time.
trans-unit.target: 两种 "Top-n "的配方大概需要的时间差不多。

trans-unit.source: Both MariaDB replication and MariaDB Galera Cluster support replication filters, so extra caution must be taken when using all of these features together. See Configuring MariaDB Galera Cluster: Replication Filters for more details on how MariaDB Galera Cluster interprets replication filters.
trans-unit.target: 无论MariaDB的复制和MariaDB的加莱拉集群支持的复制过滤器，所以格外小心，必须使用所有这些时一起服用的特点。有关MariaDB Galera Cluster如何解释复制过滤器的更多详细信息，请参见配置MariaDB Galera Cluster：复制过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Both ADD PERIOD and DROP PERIOD clauses include an option to handle whether the period already exists:
trans-unit.target: 无论 ADD PERIOD 和 DROP PERIOD 条款包括一个选项来处理周期是否已经存在：

trans-unit.source: Both pause and unpause accept one or more container names. So, if we are running a cluster, we can freeze and resume all nodes simultaneously:
trans-unit.target: 双方 pause 和 unpause 接受一个或多个容器名称。因此，如果我们正在运行集群，则可以同时冻结和恢复所有节点：

trans-unit.source: Both HTTP and HTTPS protocols are supported.
trans-unit.target: 同时支持HTTP和HTTPS协议。

trans-unit.source: Both MariaDB and Percona Server support generated columns, but neither one supports them for the MyRocks storage engine (attempts to create a table will produce an error).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB和Percona Server均支持生成的列，但MyRocks存储引擎均不支持它们（尝试创建表将产生错误）。

trans-unit.source: Both SQL Server 2005/2008 and Oracle 11g deploy table elimination in the case described above. Let us look at a more advanced query, where Oracle fails.
trans-unit.target: 在上述情况下,SQL Server 2005/2008和Oracle 11g都部署了消表功能。我们来看一个更高级的查询,Oracle失败了。

trans-unit.source: Both UpgradeWizard and mysql_upgrade_service can also be used to upgrade database instances that were installed with the ZIP installation.
trans-unit.target: UpgradeWizard和mysql_upgrade_service也可以用于升级通过ZIP安装安装的数据库实例。

trans-unit.source: Both can create the additional Instances and EBS storage's that are used in the system. mcsadmin via the addModule/addDbroot commands.
trans-unit.target: mcsadmin通过addModule/addDbroot命令,都可以创建系统中使用的额外Instance和EBS存储。

trans-unit.source: Both columns are prefixed with the percent NULL values in the column, that is, c_pref_nationkey_05 contains 5% NULL values.
trans-unit.target: 这两列都是以列中NULL值的百分比为前缀,即c_ref_nationkey_05包含5%的NULL值。

trans-unit.source: Both configurations can be set in each block’s settings tab.
trans-unit.target: 可以在每个块的设置选项卡中设置两种配置。

trans-unit.source: Both implementations use similar schema checking for thread stalls, and both have the same parameter name for thread_pool_stall_limit (though in MariaDB it is measured using millisecond units, not 10ms units like in Oracle MySQL).
trans-unit.target: 两种实现都对线程停顿使用类似的模式检查，并且对于thread_pool_stall_limit都具有相同的参数名（尽管在MariaDB中，它是用毫秒为单位测量的，而不是像Oracle MySQL那样是10ms的单位）。

trans-unit.source: Both instructions can be used indepedently and as many times as makes sense for your data and table definition.
trans-unit.target: 这两条指令都可以独立使用,而且使用次数可以根据数据和表的定义而定。

trans-unit.source: Both plugins need to be installed to get meaningful statistics.
trans-unit.target: 这两个插件都需要安装才能获得有意义的统计数据。

trans-unit.source: Both queries return:
trans-unit.target: 两个查询都返回。

trans-unit.source: Both read and write scalability
trans-unit.target: 读和写的可扩展性

trans-unit.source: Both should display the federatedx storage handler.
trans-unit.target: 两者都应该显示federatedx存储处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Both slave threads must be already stopped when using UNTIL master_gtid_pos, otherwise an error occurs. It is also an error if the slave is not configured to use GTID (CHANGE MASTER TO master_use_gtid=current_pos|slave_pos). And both threads must be started at the same time, the IO_THREAD or SQL_THREAD options can not be used to start only one of them.
trans-unit.target: 使用UNTIL master_gtid_pos时，两个从属线程必须已经停止，否则会发生错误。如果从站未配置为使用GTID（将 CHANGE MASTER TO master_use_gtid=current_pos|slave_pos ），这也是一个错误。并且两个线程必须同时启动， IO_THREAD 或 SQL_THREAD 选项不能仅用于启动其中一个。

trans-unit.source: Both statements require that you are the owner of the routine or have the SELECT privilege on the mysql.proc table. When neither is true, the statements display NULL for the Create Procedure or Create Function field.
trans-unit.target: 这两个语句都要求您是例程的所有者，或者对 mysql.proc 表具有 SELECT 特权。如果都不为真，则在“ Create Procedure 或“ Create Function 字段中，语句显示为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Both statements require that you be the owner of the routine or have SELECT access to the mysql.proc table.
trans-unit.target: 这两个语句都要求您是例程的所有者，或者具有对 mysql.proc 表的 SELECT 访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Both tables have select_type=PRIMARY, and id=1 as if they were in one join.
trans-unit.target: 两个表都具有 select_type=PRIMARY 和 id=1 ，就好像它们处于一个联接中一样。

trans-unit.source: Both the dialog and the mysql_clear_password client authentication plugins transmit the password to the server in clear text. Therefore, when you use the pam authentication plugin, it is incredibly important to encrypt client connections using TLS to prevent the clear-text passwords from being seen by unauthorized users.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 dialog 和 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件发送密码以明文的服务器。因此，在使用 pam 身份验证插件时，使用TLS加密客户端连接以防止未经授权的用户看到明文密码非常重要。

trans-unit.source: Both the foreign key columns and the referenced columns can be PERSISTENT columns. However, the ON UPDATE CASCADE, ON UPDATE SET NULL, ON DELETE SET NULL clauses are not allowed in this case.
trans-unit.target: 外键列和引用列都可以是PERSISTENT列。但是，在这种情况下，不允许使用ON UPDATE CASCADE，ON UPDATE SET NULL和ON DELETE SET NULL子句。

trans-unit.source: Both will allow user to enter EC2 Instance IDs and EBS Volume IDs, if you want to utilize AWS devices you have already created.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使用你已经创建的AWS设备,这两个将允许用户输入EC2实例ID和EBS卷ID。

trans-unit.source: Bottom line: Depending on where your Clients are, and whether you clump statements into BEGIN...COMMIT transacitons, Galera may be faster or slower than traditional replication in a WAN topology.
trans-unit.target: 一句话:根据你的客户机所在的位置,以及你是否将语句集中到BEGIN...COMMIT transacitons中,Galera在广域网拓扑中可能比传统的复制快或慢。根据你的客户机在哪里,以及你是否将语句clump到BEGIN...COMMIT transacitons中,Galera可能比WAN拓扑中的传统复制更快或更慢。

trans-unit.source: Bottom line: Don't use OFFSET; instead remember where you "left off".
trans-unit.target: 底线。不要用OFFSET,而是记住你 "离开 "的地方。

trans-unit.source: Bottom line: There may be gaps in AUTO_INCREMENT values. Consecutive rows, even on one connection, will not have consecutive ids.
trans-unit.target: 一句话:AUTO_INCREMENT值可能存在差距。AUTO_INCREMENT的值可能会有差距。连续的行,即使在一个连接上,也不会有连续的id。
